## New York Mets Top 3 Players by WAR 2024 Season

```{r}
FranciscoLindor <- 7.0
MarkVientos <- 3.2
PeteAlonso <- 2.9
```
```{r}
if ((FranciscoLindor >= MarkVientos) + (FranciscoLindor >= PeteAlonso)) {
  print ("The Most Valuable Mets Player of the 2024 season was Francisco Lindor")
} else if ((MarkVientos >= FranciscoLindor) + (MarkVientos >= PeteAlonso)){
  print ("The Most Valuable Mets Player of the 2024 season was Mark Vientos")
} else if ((PeteAlonso >= FranciscoLindor) + (PeteAlonso >= MarkVientos)) {
  print ("The Most Valuable Mets Player of the 2024 season was Pete Alonso")
}
```
